title: The Second Tier - Naples Florida Weekly
body_text:
Flowers are a quintessential Valentine’s Day gift – and area florists are creatively making unexpected arrangements. While classics, such as roses, remain strong sellers, Naples’ area florists have noted the use of fruits, lighting and other items within arrangements. It’s no longer just addons of teddy bears, balloons and candy—although...
